Articles.Content:
**I Present to you... The future of KSP warfare**

***Presenting the*** ***100% Stock*** **** ***Striker Medium Tank*** ***by Jon's Tank Factory***

**Download Link:** [**https://www.dropbox.com/s/7f0vdwld5izi7it/JTF-Striker%20Mk1.craft?dl=0**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7f0vdwld5izi7it/JTF-Striker%20Mk1.craft?dl=0)

*Scroll Down For Directions*

![lt53eLb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/lt53eLb.jpg)

**DIRECTIONS!**

**How To Operate (Follow in Chronological Order)**

#1. Press 1 to activate on-board generators

#2. Activate SAS

#3. Press Space-bar once to decouple the turret from the Tank Chasis

***Pressing [ and ] Switches between the tank chasis which is used to control the movement of the tank and the turret that is responsible for shooting junk***

#4. Board Crewmen (Or Women) into the tank. There are two seats for a commander and gunner in the turret and two drivers inside the very front of the tank

#5. Press space-bar to decouple the crew module from the tank

**Use WASD keys to control the movement of the tank as well as the turret rotation.**

*You are good to go!*

**Weaponry**

***Rockets:*** Select the turret to control after activating the brakes on the chassis, Use hotkeys 2-4 to fire each of the high velocity Ibeam penetration rockets.

***Flamethrowers:*** Select the Tank chassis to control. Line up the flamethrower with the target and be as close as possible. Press space-bar to activate the deadly stream of plasma. The Flamethrower will be spent after firing it three times.

***Gallery***

![UcBG1be.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UcBG1be.jpg)

![rMcITrX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/rMcITrX.jpg)

![yWNMETD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/yWNMETD.jpg)

![A6GQrgd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/A6GQrgd.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T03:43:44Z" title="05/18/2015 03:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by Jon144**

That is a gorgeous-looking tank, right there!

How many part is it?

I know that there is a Soviet flag right next to the tanks, but...

Reminds me more of the French AMX 50. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![AMX-50,_Tanks_in_the_Mus%C3%A9e_des_Blind%C3%A9s,_France,_pic-1.JPG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e9/AMX-50,_Tanks_in_the_Mus%C3%A9e_des_Blind%C3%A9s,_France,_pic-1.JPG)

Also, you're probably better off adding two M1x1 panels ontop of that "front wing" on the upper glacis.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T11:44:26Z" title="05/18/2015 11:44  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by KotDemopan**

Thank you for all of your feedback! I have heavier armored versions I have not yet shared. There are actually plenty of structural panels behind the "Wing" so it really isn't much of a weak-spot. The only major weakness is the small turret ring that if shot will disconnect the turret.

Very nice.

Do you have any interior screenshots?
oohhh i like these, good job ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Very nice, clean design Jon. And the weapons look terrifying!
Separatron is good choice, but launch escape system has more cannon projectile-like characteristic. Two should be clipped together to eliminate torque that LES makes.
For a second I thought those sepetrons in the last picture were the ones launched at the tank. Nice craft!
Ever tried going against other tanks? How about do a stress test ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Once I make more tanks I will for sure pit them against each-other. Too busy IRL right now. Maybe by the weekend or next week.

> 
> Once I make more tanks I will for sure pit them against each-other. Too busy IRL right now. Maybe by the weekend or next week.

Some sweet tanks you could go against with 

1569798

Or go against Zokesia Skunkwork's TOG II ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T01:36:52Z" title="05/22/2015 01:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by SHiftER2O**
